law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall adopt regulations that may be applied when:...

text.section:
The Commissioner shall adopt regulations that may be applied when:
the Governor has declared a state of emergency for the State or an area within the State under § 14-107 of the Public Safety Article; or
the President of the United States has issued a major disaster or emergency declaration for the State or an area within the State under the federal Stafford Act.

section.section: A regulation activated under paragraph (1) of this subsection may not apply beyond the duration of, or the geographical area included within, the Governor's or President's declaration of a state of emergency or disaster.

The Commissioner:
shall provide a copy of the bulletin to the emergency contact designated by the person subject to the bulletin; and
may post a copy of the bulletin on the Administration's Web site.
